title: Can't Resize client
body:
After the windows 10 update for april, my client has started acting up. 

I can't resize it beyond the smallest size without it sort of shifting in place, but it doesn't actually resize. I can't interact with it unless it's on the smallest size.

Before this, the client would open as a blank "window" but would freeze. That fixed with a reinstall, and I got the second problem.

Does anyone know how to fix this?
